00016  /*-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00017  * File:    cdeflate.h
00018  * Purpose: Header file for gzip 'deflate' encoding information.
00019  * Dependencies: should only be included from hcompi.h
00020  * Invokes: none
00021  * Contents: Structures & definitions for gzip 'deflate' encoding.
00022  * Structure definitions:
00023  * Constant definitions:
00024  *---------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00025 
00026 /* avoid re-inclusion */
00027 #ifndef __CDEFLATE_H
00028 #define __CDEFLATE_H
00029 
00030 /* Get the gzip 'deflate' header */
00031 #define intf zintf
00032 #include "zlib.h"
00033 #undef zintf
00034 
00035 #if defined c_plusplus || defined __cplusplus
00036 extern      "C"
00037 {
00038 #endif                          /* c_plusplus || __cplusplus */
00039 
00040 /*
00041    ** from cdeflate.c
00042  */
00043 
00044     extern int32 HCPcdeflate_stread
00045                 (accrec_t * rec);
00046 
00047     extern int32 HCPcdeflate_stwrite
00048                 (accrec_t * rec);
00049 
00050     extern int32 HCPcdeflate_seek
00051                 (accrec_t * access_rec, int32 offset, int origin);
00052 
00053     extern int32 HCPcdeflate_inquire
00054                 (accrec_t * access_rec, int32 *pfile_id, uint16 *ptag, uint16 *pref,
00055                int32 *plength, int32 *poffset, int32 *pposn, int16 *paccess,
00056                  int16 *pspecial);
00057 
00058     extern int32 HCPcdeflate_read
00059                 (accrec_t * access_rec, int32 length, void * data);
00060 
00061     extern int32 HCPcdeflate_write
00062                 (accrec_t * access_rec, int32 length, const void * data);
00063 
00064     extern intn HCPcdeflate_endaccess
00065                 (accrec_t * access_rec);
00066 
00067 #if defined c_plusplus || defined __cplusplus
00068 }
00069 #endif                          /* c_plusplus || __cplusplus */
00070 
00071 /* Define the [default] size of the buffer to interact with the file. */
00072 #define DEFLATE_BUF_SIZE    4096
00073 #define DEFLATE_TMP_BUF_SIZE        16384
00074 
00075 /* gzip [en|de]coding information */
00076 typedef struct
00077 {
00078     intn        deflate_level;  /* how hard to try to compress this data */
00079     int32       offset;         /* offset in the de-compressed array */
00080     intn        acc_init;       /* is access mode initialized? */
00081     int16       acc_mode;       /* access mode desired */
00082     void *       io_buf;         /* buffer for I/O with the file */
00083     z_stream    deflate_context;    /* pointer to the deflation context for each byte in the element */
00084 }
00085 comp_coder_deflate_info_t;
00086 
00087 #ifndef CDEFLATE_MASTER
00088 extern funclist_t cdeflate_funcs;   /* functions to perform gzip encoding */
00089 #else
00090 funclist_t  cdeflate_funcs =
00091 {                               /* functions to perform gzip encoding */
00092     HCPcdeflate_stread,
00093     HCPcdeflate_stwrite,
00094     HCPcdeflate_seek,
00095     HCPcdeflate_inquire,
00096     HCPcdeflate_read,
00097     HCPcdeflate_write,
00098     HCPcdeflate_endaccess
00099 };
00100 #endif
00101 
00102 #endif /* __CDEFLATE_H */
